abstract: Motorola‘s board would not endorse a nomination of billionaire financier Carl C. Icahn to join the board, the company said in a document filed with regulators on Friday. The mobile phone maker said it received a notice from Icahn entities for the nomination of the activist investor to its board at the company’s annual meeting, scheduled for May 7. But Motorola said it does not know if Mr. Icahn’s entities would “in fact solicit proxies or nominate Mr. Icahn” at the meeting.
lead_paragraph: Motorola‘s board would not endorse a nomination of billionaire financier Carl C. Icahn to join the board, the company said in a document filed with regulators on Friday. The mobile phone maker said it received a notice from Icahn entities for the nomination of the activist investor to its board at the company’s annual meeting, scheduled for May 7. But Motorola said it does not know if Mr. Icahn’s entities would “in fact solicit proxies or nominate Mr. Icahn” at the meeting.
